abstract: New drugs for hepatitis C and superhigh cholesterol succeeded in late-stage clinical trials, the developers of the products announced on Wednesday.
snippet: New drugs for hepatitis C and superhigh cholesterol succeeded in late-stage clinical trials, the developers of the products announced on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: New drugs for hepatitis C and superhigh cholesterol succeeded in late-stage clinical trials, the developers of the products announced on Wednesday. But both drugs have side effects that could dampen sales, analysts said.

headline.main: Promising Results Reported for Cholesterol and Hepatitis C Drugs
headline.print_headline: Promising Results Reported for Cholesterol and Hepatitis C Drugs
